original: The book of Psalms begins with a guide to life itself. Avoid the influence of evildoers and those who ridicule good, and adopt the study and knowledge of Torah as your main goal. Then God will reward you with a life of joy and good fortune.

notes: A wicked person promotes lawlessness and disregard for Torah, while the sinful one errs unintentionally. Nevertheless , he too is condemned , because his frivolous attitude towards God is the cause of his sinfulness (R' Hirsch)

The pronoun His refers to Hashem. This can also be rendered in his Torah, referring to the man who desires Torah. At first the text calls it תורת ה', the Torah of Hashem, but after he has toiled to understand it, it is considered as his and is called תוֹרָתוֹ, his own Torah (Rashi)
